name: Survival Man Life 2017
description:
Are you ready for the thrilling raft survival commando escape experience with lots of raft action and survival adventures.So many features you will not find in any similar game! Defend yourself from wild animals and other dangers of the island. Survival Man Life 2017 - this is new adventure simulator of island survival with sandbox elements.
Features:
• Crafting
• Building
• Survival At Island
• Wild animals hunting
• Beautiful graphics
• Real island adventure
